title: Thorny Devils
author: PixelSky208
pages:
Thorny devil also
called mountain devil,
thorny lizard, thorny
dragon and moloch

the names given to
this lizard reflects its
appearance: the two
large horned scales
on its head complete
the illusion of a
dragon or devil

The name moloch was
used for a deity of
the ancient near east,
usually depicted as a
hideous beast.

the thorny devil also
has other nicknames
people have givin it
such as the devil
lizard, horned lizard
and the thorny toad>
